description: An earlier patch of mine contained a mistake, whereby the resume() function passes block_device_info=None.
title: libvirt compute resume() passes incorrect args when getting domain XML

comments.content: An earlier patch of mine contained a mistake, whereby the resume() function passes block_device_info=None.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rkhardalian

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master

commit 038ca9b2ab78b3ea928687afe98eaefa138c5c37
Author: Rafi Khardalian <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Jan 10 20:26:55 2013 -0800

    Fix libvirt resume function call to get_domain_xml
    
    Fixes bug 1098411
    
    block_device_info was always being passed as None, which was a mistake
    I introduced with a prior patch.
